re.alwyn974.swinger.abstractcomponents

Class AbstractProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • re.alwyn974.swinger.abstractcomponents.AbstractProgressBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SColoredBar, STexturedProgressBar

    public abstract class AbstractProgressBar
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    The AbstractProgressBar

    The super-class for the progress bars, contains the bar mechanisms (value, maximums, etc...)

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
